name: DISCOVERY Children's Museum
description: Interactive museum with hands-on exhibits focused on science, art, and education for children of all ages.
reviews: This museum is fun for kids and adults alike.
Perfect for a rainy day with lots to explore.
Hands-on exhibits keep children engaged and curious.

name: Nevada State Museum, Las Vegas
address: 309 S Valley View Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89107
description: Museum showcasing Nevada’s unique history, including wildlife and cultural exhibits that interest children.
reviews: Great museum for kids to learn about Nevada history.

name: The Mob Museum
description: Engaging museum with exhibits centered on the history of organized crime and law enforcement, with kid-friendly activities.
reviews: Fascinating exhibits that kids found interesting.
Great mix of history and interactive displays.
Staff friendly and helpful to families.

name: Las Vegas Natural History Museum
address: 900 Las Vegas Blvd N, Las Vegas, NV 89101
description: Museum featuring dinosaur skeletons, animal exhibits, and a planetarium, great for children’s curiosity.
reviews: One of our favorite family spots.
Kids loved the dinosaurs and animal displays.
Helpful staff and nice gift shop.

name: DISCOVERY Children's Museum - Water World
description: A water play exhibit inside the children's museum where kids can learn about water physics with fun activities.
reviews: My kids had so much fun while learning about water!
One of the best interactive exhibits.

name: Las Vegas Springs Preserve
address: 333 S Valley View Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89107
description: Nature preserve with educational exhibits, gardens, and walking trails ideal for families with children.
reviews: Beautiful and peaceful place for a family day.
Perfect for kids to explore nature.
Great for picnics and outdoor fun.

name: Pinball Hall of Fame
address: 1610 E Tropicana Ave, Las Vegas, NV 89119
description: Museum featuring vintage pinball machines and arcade games that kids and adults enjoy.
reviews: Really fun place for kids and pinball enthusiasts.
Great mix of games from many eras.

name: Nevada State Railroad Museum
address: 2180 S Railroad St, Boulder City, NV 89005
description: Museum showcasing railroad history with historic trains and kid-friendly exhibits, located near Las Vegas.
reviews: Fascinating trains for the whole family.
Kids loved sitting in the old locomotives.

name: Clark County Museum
address: 1830 S Decatur Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89102
description: Historic museum with buildings and artifacts showing life in Nevada’s past, great for kids interested in history.

name: Wetlands Park Nature Center
address: 7050 Wetlands Park Ln, Las Vegas, NV 89122
description: Nature center with interactive exhibits about wetland ecosystems and wildlife, great for children and families.
reviews: Great place to learn about nature.
Staff provided engaging tours and activities.

name: Titanic: The Artifact Exhibition
address: 3717 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89109
description: Exhibition featuring artifacts and history of the Titanic, offering educational experiences for children and adults.
reviews: Highly engaging for older kids and adults.

name: Las Vegas Art Museum
address: 900 Las Vegas Blvd N, Las Vegas, NV 89101
description: Museum showcasing contemporary art with family-friendly activities and exhibits.
reviews: A great cultural experience for families.

name: National Atomic Testing Museum
address: 755 E Flamingo Rd, Las Vegas, NV 89119
description: Museum focused on the history of nuclear testing with interactive exhibits suitable for older children.
reviews: Great for science-loving kids and teens.

name: DISCOVERY Children's Museum - Dino Lab
description: Dinosaur-themed exhibit with interactive fossils and educational activities for kids.
reviews: Very interactive and fun science activities.

name: Las Vegas Holocaust Museum
address: 2101 S Jones Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89146
description: Museum dedicated to Holocaust education with exhibits accessible to older children and teens.
reviews: Educational for older kids and teens.

name: Las Vegas Discovery Museum
description: Hands-on children’s museum with rotating exhibits related to science and art.
reviews: My children were engaged for hours.
Great for kids of all ages.
